name: Eight Ball Pinball
description: I have attempted to re-create Ballys' 1977 Pinball Game using Unitys' built in physics engine.  This version does not save the high score but does have an options menu to change 3 or 5 balls per game. Up to 4 people can play. There is 2 different modes for "easy" or "normal" game play. This version does not have a nudge or tilt. The next version should have those upgrades. For now, I am looking for some feed back on the game play, esp. if you have played the real machine. It can be used with the keyboard or game controller. There is a camera follow mode that can be toggled on/ off by the "F" key of the Y button on a game controller.
